{"title":"Section 9, Page 3","subjec":{},"descri":{},"creato":{},"publis":{},"date":{},"year":{},"format":{},"reposi":{},"collec":{},"reposa":{},"rights":{},"digitb":{},"langua":{},"topics":{},"cite":{},"notes":{},"notesa":{},"source":{},"box":{},"folder":{},"identi":{},"relati":{},"findin":{},"catalo":{},"type":{},"full":"BY-LAWS.
ARTICLE I.
The tenure of all offices created and enumerated in the Charter
of the Company, or other employees in the service of the same, shall
be during the will of the Board of Direction. They shall be elective
at the 6rst meeting of the next Board, and annually thereafter; and
in case any officer is removed by the Board before the expir.-itinn of
the time for which lie was elected, he shall be entitled to pay only
for the term he may have been in the actual service of the Company,
and not for the whole period for which he was chosen.
ARTICLE II.
It shall be the duty of the President to preside at all meetings of
the Board; to convoke it specially when he thinks proper, or upon
the written requisition of any five Directors ; to perform the office of
elect one; to exercise a general supervision and control over the
affairs and agents of the Company ; and to do and perform all other
duties not otherwise assigned or provided for. His salary shall he
81500 per annum, payable monthly on his own warrant.
ARTICLE III.
14 shall be the duty of the Secretary to attend each meeting of
*<> Board; to keep an accurate and fair record of all its proceedings ;
to netify in writ;ng eacll ancj every meeting ; and to do and perform
« other duties that may he devolved upon him by either the Presi-
n or the Board. He shall have charge and custody of all Records,
0 % Reports, Minutes, and other papers belonging to the Company.
